channel.title: DC29 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team
channel.description: Recent content in DC29 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team

item.title: We're back and... DEF CON 29 in the books
item.description: effffn, mac and DEF CON would like to thank the hard-working NOC Goons for making the on-site conference network, well, work. #sparky, booger, CRV, c0mmiebstrd, Dp1i, c7five, Jon2, deadication, musa, wish, johntitor, MikeD and Toph put in long hours (some on-site and some remotely) in making sure everything worked at least at one point in time. And then got them fixed when you (or quite possibly we) broke something. As usual, also a huge thank you to Caesars IT and Encore for making our lives a bit easier.
